mapper.update: update `tb_company_apply_log` log set log.`new_company_id` = (select id from `tb_hospital_company` comp where comp.`tb_exam_company_id` = log.`company_id` and comp.`organization_id` = log.`hospital_id`), log.`gmt_created` = now(), log.`gmt_modified` = now() where log.`new_company_id` is null
